Reference

All functions

MR_mega_MDS()

Calculate MDS of the Euclidean distance matrix

Linear regression model with weights for environment-adjusted MR-MEGA approach

Linear regression model with weights for MR-MEGA approach

MR_mega_normalize

MR_mega_prep()

Prepare data for MR-mega approach and environment-adjusted MR-MEGA approach (mr-mega)

GWAS data sets

Select the quantified genetic variants with the specified threshold of MAF, chromosome and position.

The smoking proportions across the 7 populations.
